text:
To reproduce the BUG create a blank jsp containing :
<html>
<head></head>
<body>
 there is two backslash here => \\$
</body>
</html>

Resulting page show : 
 there is two backslash here => \$

In tomcat 6 the result is correct.
creator: guillaume.bonillo@actemedia.com

text: OK, sorry. I've found spec definition explaning the $ EL evaluation syntax that explain that...
